# currentDiskUsage

**Instance Property**

The current size of the on-disk cache, in bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentDiskUsage: Int { get }
```

## Getting and setting on-disk cache properties

- **diskCapacity**: The capacity of the on-disk cache, in bytes.
